response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I understand its importance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. I am confident that this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
